sentences.en: booksellers normally order books on a sale-or-return basis.
sentences.cn: 书商通常根据剩货包退的原则定购图书。

sentences.en: Car salesmen will often bring down the price rather than lose a sale (= fail to sell something ) .
sentences.cn: 汽车推销员常常宁愿降价也不愿失去一笔生意。

sentences.en: cars for sale at reasonable prices.

sentences.en: Harvey gets a $50 commission every time he makes a sale (= sells something as part of his job ) .
sentences.cn: 哈维每做成一笔生意可得到50美元的佣金。

sentences.en: He blended in with the crowd at the art sale.
sentences.cn: 他混入了艺术品拍卖会的人群中。

sentences.en: He bought a sports jacket on sale at Gowings Men's Store.
sentences.cn: 他在高英斯男装店买了一件打折的运动上衣。

sentences.en: He was disgusted with the stodgy pizzas on sale in London.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌吃伦敦卖的难以下咽的比萨饼。

sentences.en: I'll sell at a discount in return for a speedy sale.
sentences.cn: 为了尽快售出，我会打折销售。

sentences.en: In 1991, the house was advertised for sale at $49,000.
sentences.cn: 1991年，这座房子登广告出售，售价为49,000美元。

sentences.en: Our real bete noire is the car boot sale.
sentences.cn: 我们最烦那些用汽车后备箱摆摊卖旧货的。

sentences.en: She was ringing up her sale on an ancient cash register.
sentences.cn: 她正用一台老掉牙的收银机记账。

sentences.en: The beans are then ground and packaged for sale as ground coffee.
sentences.cn: 然后那些咖啡豆被磨碎，包装好作为咖啡粉出售。

sentences.en: the November issue is on sale now.
sentences.cn: 11月号的杂志现在已经在发售了。

sentences.en: The painting was bought by dealers at the Christie's sale.
sentences.cn: 这幅油画在佳士得的拍卖会上被交易商拍走。

sentences.en: The sale is a big coup for the auction house.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易是该拍卖行的一大成功之举。

sentences.en: The trio are part of Sotheby's sale of Works of Art.
sentences.cn: 该三件套是苏富比艺术品拍卖会上的一件拍品。

sentences.en: There are many boats, new and used, for sale.
sentences.cn: 有很多新旧不一的船待售。

sentences.en: There was a camera for sale in the window.
sentences.cn: 橱窗里有一架相机待售。

sentences.en: There was a Leica camera for sale in the window.
sentences.cn: 橱窗里有架莱卡相机待售。

sentences.en: Your old clothes will be gratefully accepted by jumble sale organisers.
sentences.cn: 旧货义卖的组织者会感激地领受您捐赠的旧衣物。
